players.name: Alice
memory: Diana: "Charlie, I think we should investigate you to clear the air."
You: "Let's all work together to uncover the truth. I, as the mafioso, have taken my first action but we need to ensure everyone is on the right side."

players.name: Charlie

Alice: "Let's all work together to uncover the truth. I, as the mafioso, have taken my first action but we need to ensure everyone is on the right side."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Alice (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Diana voted for Alice
